## My Projects

Here you'll find information about various projects I've worked on, showcasing my technical abilities and interests.

### TradeWarCoin - Memecoin Project

![TradeWarCoin Logo](https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/u/placeholder?s=80){width=80 style="float: left; margin-right: 20px;"}

**TradeWarCoin** is a memecoin I recently developed on the Solana blockchain. This project demonstrates my interest and capabilities in cryptocurrency development and blockchain technology.

- **Website**: [tradewarcoin.com](https://tradewarcoin.com)
- **DEX Screener**: [View on DexScreener](https://dexscreener.com/solana/TWCDsC5FGoXLxFjiKokBxcKVf8HSLSKH7GGrbnrWAK2)
- **Technologies Used**: Solana Blockchain, Rust, Web3.js
- **Purpose**: Exploring decentralized finance while creating an engaging community-driven token

### Communication Device Development (Ngee Ann Polytechnic)

As a Design and Development Officer at Ngee Ann Polytechnic, I continued a Final Year Project focused on enhancing communication in confined spaces:

- Developed Arduino-based devices using **C++** for improved communication between confined space personnel and supervisors
- Implemented error-checking in transmitted data packets to enhance reliability
- Created data filtering algorithms to reduce noise interference in accelerometer readings
- Focused on intuitive design for improved user experience

---

### Battery Efficiency Optimization (Keppel Data Centers)

Led a project funded by Keppel Data Centers that focused on:

- Analyzing voltage vs. time data to optimize battery longevity
- Integrating step-up regulators to enhance device capabilities
- Conducting on-site testing and demonstrations to showcase improvements
- Documenting performance enhancements for future development
